page.title: 18GAMES
page.content: In School on the playground we play hopscotch. In hopscotch the numbers are from one to eight and you have to throw a stone and whichever number it lands on you jump and hop to it. You pick up the stone and jump and hop back again. We skip as well and there is a game called H.E.L.P. You skip to the letters H.E.L.P. until you are tired. H stands for High Water, E stands for Easy, L stands for Leap Frog and P stands for fast. If someone lands on H the other person has to have the rope high. Another game is called Bulldog when there are two homes and you have to run to one of them. The last person is 'it' and they have to be 'it' if they hit someone else. They have to make everybody 'it' and the one who does not get 'it' is the fastest runner.
